Bellevue.Hing Hay Park: Hing Hay Park (Chinese: 慶喜公園) is a 0.3-acre (1,200 m2) public park in the Seattle Chinatown-International District of Seattle, Washington. Specifically, the park is within the Seattle Chinatown Historic District (US National Register of Historic Places, 1986). Both are within the Seattle Chinatown International District (City Ordinance 119297).
